com.davidmiguel.gobees.apiaries

Class ApiariesPresenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.davidmiguel.gobees.apiaries.ApiariesPresenter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ApiariesContract.LoadDataPresenter, BaseLoadDataPresenter, BasePresenter

    class ApiariesPresenter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ApiariesContract.LoadDataPresenter
    Listens to user actions from the UI ApiariesFragment, retrieves the data and updates the UI as required.

      • checkCurrentWeather

        private void checkCurrentWeather(boolean forceUpdate,
                                 java.util.List<Apiary> apiaries)
        Checks whether current weather is up to date (less than 15min old). If not, orders to update the current weather in all apiaries.
        Parameters:
        forceUpdate - force to update weather.
        apiaries - list of apiaries.
